arts.ttl: Villarreal star stretchered out of Espanyol clash
arts.sum: A leading member of the defensive ranks at Villarreal was on Thursday night stretchered out of the club’s latest outing. The Yellow Submarine marked their return to action a short…

arts.ttl: Villarreal star admits ‘I cried for five minutes’ after Barcelona star Ter Stegen’s injury
arts.sum: A member of the attacking ranks at La Liga outfit Villarreal has opened up on the mental and emotional impact which the serious injury suffered by Barcelona’s Marc-André ter Stegen…
